      • calcDirection

        public final int calcDirection(RailPath.Position position)
        Calculates the direction best matching this segment, using vector dot product. Returns an integer representing the order in which segments should be iterated. A value of 1 indicates p0 -> p1 (increment segments) and -1 indicates p1 -> p0 (decrement segments).
        Parameters:
        position, - is assigned the direction and roll of this segment that best matches
        Returns:
        order (-1 for decrement, 1 for increment)

      • calcDistanceSquared

        public final double calcDistanceSquared(org.bukkit.util.Vector position)
        Calculates the squared distance between an arbitrary point and this segment.
        Parameters:
        position - relative to the rails
        Returns:
        distance squared

      • calcDistanceSquared

        public final double calcDistanceSquared(org.bukkit.util.Vector position,
                                        double theta)
        Calculates the squared distance between an arbitrary point and this segment. The theta value from calcTheta(double, double, double) can be reused here.
        Parameters:
        position - relative to the rails
        theta - (0.0 ... 1.0)
        Returns:
        distance squared

      • calcPosition

        public void calcPosition(org.bukkit.util.Vector position,
                         double theta)
        Assigns the x/y/z position to the vector based on theta, where the theta is clamped between 0.0 and 1.0
        Parameters:
        position - where the result is assigned to
        theta - (0.0 ... 1.0)

      • calcPosition

        public void calcPosition(RailPath.Position position,

        Parameters:

        theta - (0.0 ... 1.0)

      • calcTheta

        public final double calcTheta(org.bukkit.util.Vector position)
        Calculates the theta (0.0 ... 1.0) for the point on this segment closest to a particular coordinate. Theta results lower than 0 or higher than 1 indicate a point that is beyond the ends of the segment.
        Parameters:
        position - relative to the rails
        Returns:
        theta

      • calcTheta

        public final double calcTheta(RailPath.Position position)
        Calculates the theta (0.0 ... 1.0) for the point on this segment closest to a particular coordinate. Theta results lower than 0 or higher than 1 indicate a point that is beyond the ends of the segment.
        Parameters:
        position - relative to the rails
        Returns:
        theta
